query: ALTER TABLE `#__social_conversations` ADD COLUMN `title_alias` varchar(64) DEFAULT '' AFTER `title`;
ALTER TABLE `#__social_lists` ADD `type` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'friends';
ALTER TABLE `#__social_marketplaces` ADD COLUMN `longitude` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT 'The longitude value of the marketplace listing';
ALTER TABLE `#__social_marketplaces` ADD COLUMN `latitude` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT 'The latitude value of the marketplace listing';
ALTER TABLE `#__social_marketplaces` ADD COLUMN `address` text COMMENT 'The full address value of the marketplace listing';
